body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Happy Stays customer service. My name is Joe Perez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi there! My name is Sarah Garcia.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I stayed at one of your hotels recently and I was a bit confused about the food quality.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Sarah. Could you provide me with the location and the date of your stay?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I stayed at the Happy Stays hotel in Los Angeles on the twenty-fifth of July.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. Can I also get your room number during that stay for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My room number was three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Sarah. I will look into this matter further for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Sarah. If you have any more concerns, feel free to reach out to us again. Have a great day!
